    • Uses of CrawlContext in org.gbif.crawler

      Classes in org.gbif.crawler with type parameters of type CrawlContext 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractCrawlListener<CTX extends CrawlContext,REQ,RESP>
      Simple abstract base listener so that you can only have to implement the methods you're interested in.
      class  Crawler<CTX extends CrawlContext,REQ,RESP,RES>
      This crawler can be used to crawl datasets.
      interface  CrawlListener<CTX extends CrawlContext,REQ,RESP>
      Used to listen for crawl events.
      interface  CrawlStrategy<CTX extends CrawlContext>
      This is used to model a specific way to crawl a dataset.
      interface  RequestHandler<CTX extends CrawlContext,REQ>
      This builds a protocol specific request for a certain crawl context.
